name: EPICS/RTEMS BLC device drivers
short_description:
README.RTEMS is the file, which describes the
changes in the original EPICS software (S/W) posted at http://cars.uchicago.edu/software/epics/mca.html in order to have it running on an EPICS/RTEMS control system. In addition to the newly developed RTEMS device driver for the SIS3820 scaler and RTEMS save/restore S/W, it includes the RTEMS device drivers for the OMS58 and MaxV motor controllers,  Avme944x bit I/Os, and the Joeger scaler. Other unlisted devices are not tested under RTEMS yet.
summary: It is ported from EPICS synApp and MCA for the RTEMS O.S..
